mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM, TITLE, ID, NICK, CONTENT, HIT_CNT, CREATE_DT, CATEGORY, MBTI, LIKE_CNT FROM TB_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{BOARD_NUM}
SELECT BOARD_NUM, ORIGINAL_NM, SAVED_NM, FILE_SIZE FROM TB_BOARD_IMG WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{BOARD_NUM}
SELECT PROF_IMG FROM TB_USER U, TB_BOARD B WHERE U.ID = B.ID AND B.ID= #{ID}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_COMMENTS ( COMMENT_NUM, BOARD_NUM, ID, NICK, CONTENTS, REGDATE, MBTI, PROF_IMG ) values ( SEQ_TB_COMMENTS_COMMENT_NUM.NEXTVAL, #{BOARD_NUM}, #{ID}, #{NICK}, #{CONTENTS}, SYSDATE, #{MBTI}, #{PROF_IMG} )
mapper.select: select COMMENT_NUM, BOARD_NUM, CONTENTS, REGDATE, ID, NICK, MBTI, PROF_IMG from TB_COMMENTS where BOARD_NUM = #{BOARD_NUM} order by COMMENT_NUM desc
select count(ID) from TB_COMMENTS where BOARD_NUM = #{BOARD_NUM}
